tool_description: Exports candidate search results to various formats with customizable fields, filtering options, and professional report generation.

export_format.description: Export file format (CSV, Excel, PDF, JSON)

error_messages: Empty candidate data: At least one candidate record must be provided
Invalid export format: Use one of [CSV, Excel, PDF, JSON]
Invalid filename: Filename must contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, and underscores
Export size limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 candidate records per export
usage: Provide candidate_data array and specify desired export_format. Optionally customize filename and choose whether to include scoring data.

file_size_mb.description: Size of exported file in megabytes
